2016: I can't wait for this year to be over.
2017: I can't wait for this week to be over.
@KarlBrophy I get it, and I think ignoring context has the effect you think being literal has. No more to say really.
@PaulAnthonyWard What tortuous route got you from "I'm against a muslim ban" to "I'm pro- a Christian ban"? @KarlBrophy
@KarlBrophy the order expressly prioritises other religions for access. You see what you want to see. https://t.co/eXGGjnxVTG
@KarlBrophy it's not fake news https://t.co/Vla2z8l4VK
@KarlBrophy that kind of literalism when the intent is clear just clouds a simple matter of racism.
@KarlBrophy Guiliani already admitted they were aiming at a Muslim ban (not to mention it's a trump campaign promise)
@Challopea @EFF @cdixon25 presumably because the govt vetting your opinions on sitting president is against the first amendment.
@cathyby @CharlotteGore they seem pretty happy to reverse their stated positions so far. Endorsed GWB's Iraq expedition.
@cathyby @CharlotteGore the notion of starting a war to shore up support isn't a new one :(
@unakavanagh my mistake, another look at her timeline reveals a massive anti-Semite.
@unakavanagh I wonder how many racists would be able to converse with you in Irish...
@dreasaez the problem with impeachment is that it's a political act, not a justice act. GOP will keep him until they think he's toxic.
@bigmonsterlove I was thinking that; maybe he's planning to return Alaska to Russia.
@brian_dneen he's behind a firewall. I'm very happy not to know what he says any more.
